item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Jennifer Egan
item.description: "Like all failed experiments, that one taught me something I didnâ€™t expect: one key ingredient of so-called experience is the delusional faith that it is unique and special, that those included in it are privileged and those excluded from it are missing out." -- Jennifer Egan

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Jennifer Egan
item.description: "Structural dissatisfaction: Returning to circumstances that once pleased you, after having experienced a more thrilling or opulent way of life, and finding that you can no longer tolerate them." -- Jennifer Egan

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Jennifer Egan
item.description: "There's a fine line between thinking about somebody and thinking about not thinking about somebody, but I have the patience and the self-control to walk that line for hours - days, if I have to." -- Jennifer Egan
